thread.title: sneaky charges for local calls
thread.title_full: sneaky charges for local calls - Review of InterContinental Paris Le Grand, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: kdc1977
title: sneaky charges for local calls
text: Without warning at check in, and no notice on the room's phone itself, this hotel charges exorbitant amounts for local calls. Then, they take no responsibility for not warning the customer that local calls are not free and are not included in the resort fee. I'm talking about hundreds of euros charged for several brief local calls to local tour operators.
